pages.title: Location Bookmarks
pages.text: Save named locations your companion can remember and navigate to.$(br2)$(bold)Commands:$(br)$(li)$(thing)"Remember this spot as 'base'"$() — Save current location$(li)$(thing)"What bookmarks do you have?"$() — List all saved$(li)$(thing)"Go to 'base'"$() — Navigate to a bookmark$(li)$(thing)"Forget the 'base' bookmark"$() — Delete$(br2)Bookmarks persist across sessions via NBT data. Use them with the $(bold)deliver_items$() tool to send your companion on delivery runs to named places.$(br2)Tip: Bookmark your mine entrances, farms, and trading halls!
